revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Review proofreading corrections and annotate Davis and Pendleton and date and Ackerman.
Proofread and annotate Hannah and Charles Heyde.
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p: i received your letter yesterday was glad to hear you was as well in regard to your lame thumb as you are i feel quite smart to day and yesterday it is much cooler the hot days does seem to take me down it has been some pretty hot days here but is quite comfortable to day) i had a letter from han last week she seems pretty well wants me to come there very much indeed i wrote to her that i dident didn't know how to undertake the journeey journey in my condition being at times so very lame i dont don't think i could go any how if i wasent wasn't lame i have got a dress and a few things to send her but i cant can't go there this summer i suppose Charley heydeHeyde wrote he had paid all for his house if he was a decent man they might live quite comfortable but that will never be

davisDavis was here yesterday he is employed at lowel Lowell as cheif chief engineer he is not going to st louis St. Louis till september September and then he will stop here again he says he has many little petty annoyances so he thought he would come to new york New York for a few days i told him i beleived believed there was always something in every department some one sort and some another but there must be a something i expect he feels any little thing more not having Jeff to condole with him he is quite nerviousnervous and irritable at times he looks firs first rate georgeGeorge is away wont won't come i dont don't think till about the 4th so waltWalt you are going to have quite a great change in your department for better or for worser i suppose time will tell i see awfull awful things said about putting in Ackerman the ex rebel as he is called) i havent haven't heard from st louis St. Louis in a long time your letters is mostly all the corresspondence correspondence i have) no more this time
